title: starting fresh new team    gold and up please
body:
i need everything but top   and this team will stick together through the thick and the thin and grow together as a team. I am looking for players who can take criticism but isn't a asshole or rager  about everything. team growth comes first.   I wanna do leagues and tourneys eventually when the team feels they are ready.. add me on the game or leave your ign on here and ill add you..

IGN -  RG SPEED

replies.body: Saronska- Gold III Jack of All trades, i can play what you want and where you want it
Talon and Zed Plat 2 mid lane
im silver 2 right now, gonna hit gold probs next week, (Xainco) is my IGN
